abstract: Twelve stories from Melbourne's western suburbs about identity.
description: Twelve stories from people from Melbourne's western suburbs, created at ACMI as part of 'Western stories : Expressions for the future' Digital Storytelling project. The participants talk about the things they love and, in doing so, highlight what it is about them that make them unique.
